K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213a-1: badzra satva m'a y'a dza la gu hya sarba a'a darsha n'a ma tantra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213a-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba thams cad kyi me long zhes bya ba'i rgyud /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213a-4: aom rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213a-5: h'um mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213a-6: aam snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213a-7: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213a-8: rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213a-9: kun gyis dbang bskur gter 'dzin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213a-10: dgyes shing spyan gdangs gus bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213a-11: rgyal ba kun la bstod bskor nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-0: @213b ae ma ho sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-1: rtog pa kun gyi rgyal po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-2: cho ga rgyas par bstan pa'i rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-3: dri med zab mo brtag dka' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-4: 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-5: dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-6: sku gsung thugs kyi cho ga'i rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-8: rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-9: sgyu 'phrul gang gis bstan pa de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-10: dra ba'i rgyud de gang phyir bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-11: lung ni gang phyir brjod pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-12: gang phyir spyi zhes bya bar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-13: gsang ba zhes ni ji lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-14: snying po'i don ni ci yi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-15: de kho nyid ces ji ltar brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-16: nges pa zhes pa ci yi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-17: mtshan 'di gang zag gang la gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-18: mtshan gyi dri ba dris pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-19: thun mong khyad par tshul nyid kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-20: ston pa zhes ni ci yi phyir; ;gnas dang 'khor ni ji lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-21: dus dang sdud pa ji lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-22: mi bskyod pa ni ji ltar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-23: rnam par snang mdzad ji ltar brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-24: rin chen 'byung ldan gang gi phyir; ;snang ba mtha' yas gang gi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-25: don yod grub pa ji lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-26: spyan dang nam mkha'i dbyings ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-27: gos dkar mo dang m'a ma k'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-28: sgrol ma zhes pa gang gi phyir; ;sa yi snying po ci yi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-29: nam snying spyan ras gzigs dbang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-30: phyag na rdo rje gang phyir brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:213b-31: sgeg mo phreng dang glu gar ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-2: 'jam dpal zhes pa ci yi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-3: dus bzhi bdug spos me tog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-4: mar me dri chab gang phyir brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-5: rnam rgyal gshin rje gshed po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-6: rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-7: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-8: dril bu zhes pa gang phyir brjod //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-10: gtso bos bdag la nges par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-11: gang phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-12: nang dang gsang ba'i gleng gzhi las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-13: ston pa bstan pa gnas dang 'khor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-14: dus dang sdud pa ji ltar brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-15: grags pa thun mong gleng gzhi las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-16: ston pa 'khor gnas dus ji ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-17: bstan pa sdud pa ji lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-18: skyes bu chen pos bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-19: 'di ni gleng gzhi'i dri ba tshigs su bcad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-20: thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-21: gleng bslang gnyis su ci phyir 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-22: gang gis gang la gleng bslang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-23: thabs dang 'bras bu ci yin ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-24: thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-25: sems lnga ye shes lnga yi rim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-26: gang dang 'brel pa bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-27: 'di ni gleng bslang ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-28: skyes bu chen po ston pa'i gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214a-29: sgyu 'phrul dra bar mnga' brnyes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214b-0: phun sum tshogs @214b pa chos kyi rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214b-1: gzi brjid phung po phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214b-2: blta bya gang la ci yi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214b-3: gang gis rtogs par ji ltar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214b-4: rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214b-5: rtogs pa'i sgo ni de ru gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214b-6: gtan tshigs tshul dang 'bras bu ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214b-8: thun mong spyod pa ci yi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214b-9: shes rab tshogs dang thugs rje dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214b-10: rtogs dang phyogs gcig spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214b-12: gang gis gang la ji ltar spyad //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214b-17: thun mong spyi dang khyad par gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214b-18: rang bzhin nyid dang lhun grub gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214b-19: dkyil 'khor zhes pa gang ci'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214b-20: de nyid phyi nang gsang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214b-23: lhag pa ting 'dzin zhes bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214b-24: gnyis la sku gsung thugs sbyor dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214b-28: gang gi gzugs brnyan gang la snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214b-29: phyi nang gsang ba ji ltar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:214b-30: lhag pa zhes pa gang phyir te //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215a-2: don dam kun rdzob byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215a-3: phyi nang gsang ba ji ltar sbyor //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215a-13: legs par gsungs shig rgyal mchog che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215a-14: 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi dri ba dris pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215a-15: gang gis gang la gang dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215a-16: ji ltar dbang bskur phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215a-17: bdag gis ji ltar shes par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215a-18: gang dang gang du ji ltar 'brel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215a-19: skyon dang yon tan ji lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215a-20: 'bras bu rim pa bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215a-22: las kyi rim pa ji lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215a-23: rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215a-24: sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215a-25: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215a-26: bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215a-28: dbang gi don mtha' dag la dri ba dris pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215a-29: gang la gang gis brten pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215b-0: @215b dam tshig ces pa ci yi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215b-1: rtsa ba dam tshig du zhig bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215b-2: gang phyir rtsa bar brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215b-3: yan lag du zhig bstan pa gsungs //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215b-8: lta dang spyod dang sgrub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215b-9: shes bya ting 'dzin dam tshig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215b-10: grub dang mi spong bsrung ci zhig /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215b-12: thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215b-13: mchod dang mchog gyur ma yin pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215b-14: bsgrub pa'i khyad par ji lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215b-15: gang gis gang du ji ltar bsgrub //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215b-17: dbye dang bskrad dang pham rgyal ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215b-18: gter dang mig rnon rkang mgyogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215b-20: rgyal ba mchog gis bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215b-21: 'di sgrub pa'i dri ba dris pa'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215b-25: ting 'dzin 'dug stangs ho ma khung ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215b-26: gdul bya rim pa gang ci zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:215b-27: khyad par rim pa ji ltar bshad //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216a-1: ni; 'phrin las kyi dri ba dris pa'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216a-4: phyi nang gsang ba'i lam ci phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216a-5: stong pa'i rnal 'byor snying rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216a-6: phyag rgya gcig dang spros bcas ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216a-7: rnam smin dbang sgyur phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216a-8: lhun gyis grub pa'i mtshan nyid ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216a-9: mthar phyin rnam pa du zhig gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216a-10: phyi nang gsang ba mthar phyin pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216a-11: 'bras bu bdag gzhan don nyid ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216a-12: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i don ji ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216a-13: gang dag rtog pa'i rgyal po de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216a-14: sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla na med //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216a-16: cho ga rgyas par bshad pa'i rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216a-17: skal ngan rnams kyis ma rtogs pa'i //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216b-3: thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216b-4: rkyen stobs nus pa so sor snang; ;khyad par rim par gang gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216b-5: rang bzhin gdul bya bder gshegs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216b-6: 'khrul pa'i dbang gis so sor snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216b-7: ma bcos dang la tha dad med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216b-8: rang snang las kyis tha dad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216b-9: bye brag rnam par bstan pa kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216b-10: de bzhin nyid la dgod bya'i phyir //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216b-12: dri ba'i don 'di lung bstan cing; ;thabs dang shes rab 'brel gyur pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216b-13: gsang ba'i don la dgod du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216b-14: sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba me long gi rgyud las /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216b-19: rang byung dag pa'i gzhal yas na //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:216b-25: gsung dang gsung 'gyur thugs kyi rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-0: @217a *// thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-1: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-2: cho ga rgyas par dris pa'i mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-4: rang rig byang chub sems nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-5: tha dad med pa'i rang bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-6: rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-7: rang bzhin mtha' thug med pa'i chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-8: thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-9: thugs su chud cing mngon rtogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-10: phyi nang gsang ba'i sems dpar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-11: rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-12: nus pa'i rim pa stsal snang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-13: thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-14: sgyu 'phrul zhes ni bzhir bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-15: tha dad mi las tha dad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-16: ngo bo thabs dang bstan nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-17: byin rlabs shugs kyis 'brel pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-18: drang ba'i don zhes bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-19: ma brjod grags pa'i bstan pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-20: sgro skur med dang zhal nas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-21: dri ma med pa'i lung nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-22: las dang ye shes spyi nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-23: rdzogs pas rdzogs phyir lung nyid de; ;bstan pa spyi yi bdag nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-24: thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-25: gcig dang dum mi gnas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217a-26: so so'i bstan pa rgya mtsho'i rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-1: don kun 'di la yongs rdzogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-2: lung gi spyi zhes bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-3: gang phyir gsang ba zhes bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-4: sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-5: rang bzhin ye nas ngo bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-6: thabs dang 'bras bur gyur pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-7: gsang ba'i don du 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-8: ngang gis dman dang ma sbyangs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-9: dpang dab dam tshig bral ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-10: rang brtags bsgribs pa sa'i khyad par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-11: de dang de yi dbang gis na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-12: ro myong bral phyir gsang bar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-13: rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-14: chos rnams thig le chen po'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-16: ma lus ro gcig dbyer med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-17: ji snyed theg pa'i khyad par dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-18: bstan pa'i bye brag gnas pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-20: rtsa bar gyur pa kho na yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-21: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-22: byang chub sems nyid bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-23: rang byung ye shes thog mtha' med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-24: rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-25: rgyal ba'i byin rlabs rab snang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-26: bsam gyis mi khyab che ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-27: 'di las ston pas snying po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-28: snying po dang ni 'od bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-30: snying po zhes ni bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:217b-31: gang phyir thams cad byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-2: dngos po gsum gyis khyab gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-3: yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-4: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i; ;de bzhin nyid du rdo rjes rig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-5: bdag dang gzhan don nus ba rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-6: 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-7: gang phyir dngos gnyis tha dad par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-8: log par brtags pa'i snang ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-9: mun la snang dang gser 'gyur ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-10: ro gcig thabs kyis de kho na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-11: de phyir de kho na zhes brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-12: dngos po sna tshogs dbyer med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-13: tha dad don min don gcig min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-14: de nyid gsang ba'i nges pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-15: gzhi dang lam dang ngo bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-16: nges pas nges pa gsum du bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-17: gang du theg pa bzhi gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-19: ro gcig theg par nges gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-20: nges pa'i theg pa bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-21: rang bzhin ma bcos rang byung las; ;bya byed ngang gis bral ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-24: rang bzhin mtha' dbus med pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-25: rgyu rkyen las kyis so sor 'khrul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-26: de nyid byang chub sems nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-27: mtha' dbus med par mnyam par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218a-28: de ltar so sor snang ba'i rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-0: nam mkha' @218b dang ris phye ba ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-1: rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-2: lam gnyis 'brel par mngon bsgoms pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-3: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-4: bde chen thig le mngon snang ba; ;'jug dang grol ba'i lam nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-5: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lam du brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-6: rang bzhin yongs kyis khyab pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-7: dngos dbang thabs kyis 'brel pa yis; ;rig pa ji bzhin stobs gyur pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-8: khyad par thabs kyi sgyu 'phrul yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-9: thog ma med pa'i rdo rje sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-10: chos kun rang gi ngo bo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-11: zab mo bstan pa ci yi lung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-12: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-13: rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-14: bskal pa grangs med sngon rol nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-15: shes rab sbyangs dang snying rje ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-16: dad dang brtson 'grus dam tshig dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-17: cho gas dag par sbyangs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-18: dbang po rab kyi spyod yul yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-19: rdo rje gsang ba'i theg pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-20: ngo bo nyid dang byin rlabs dang; ;mtshon dang rdo rjer grub pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-21: rdo rje theg pa bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-22: rang bzhin ngan dang dman pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-23: phyin ci log dang mi mos dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-24: dbang dang dam tshig med pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-25: gsang phyir gsang ba'i theg par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-26: thabs dang bral ba'i slob dpon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-27: snod dang bral ba'i slob ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:218b-28: gsang ba'i snying po bstan gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-1: dang gzhan kun sdug bsngal zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-2: sreg dang bsgribs par yun ring gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-3: sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje me long gi rgyud chen po las; mtshan gyi don gyi bshad pa dang po'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-4: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-5: thun mong ma gyur gsang ba'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-6: thun mong ma yin 'khor dag la; ;phyogs bcu rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-7: dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-9: byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-10: thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-11: nyon mongs lta dang shes bya rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-12: skad cig yud la gsal byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-13: thun mong khyad par gsal ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-14: lam gnyis nges par ston pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-15: ston pa zhes ni brjod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-16: de yi gnas mchog bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-17: 'byung dang bzhugs dang rten pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-18: mtshon pa byin gyis brlabs phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-19: thabs dang lam gyi khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-20: kun bdag rdo rje 'chang chen nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-21: gtsang ma rigs dag spangs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-22: 'og min gnas mchog chen po der; ;yang dag sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-23: skal med skye bo gdul ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219a-24: sprul pa po ni 'dir sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-0: sangs rgyas kun gyi bzhugs pa'i @219b gnas; ;gtsang ma rigs dag rnam spangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-1: 'jig rten las kyis mthar gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-3: phyogs bcur rgya yongs ma chad pa'i; ;yon tan khyad par spags pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-4: gsang ba yum gyi bha ga la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-5: bcu gsum sa yi dbang phyug ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-6: rdo rje 'chang chen dpag med dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-7: til 'bru'i tshul du rab tu bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-8: chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-9: thog ma tha ma dbus med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-10: rang bzhin don gyi 'og min ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-11: rgyal ba kun gyi pho brang phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-12: 'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-13: rgyal ba kun gyi rten pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-14: de dag nye bar mtshan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-15: yid dang mtshan ma las gyur pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-16: bsgoms dang bris dang byas la sogs; ;de dang 'dra ba'i gzhal yas khang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-17: rgyal ba sngags dang byin rlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-18: der gnas don phyir mtshon pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-19: thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-20: bsod nams ye shes khyad par can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-21: bsags pa sna tshogs las byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-22: rdzogs longs spyod pa chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-23: gtsang ma rigs dag spangs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-24: 'og min chen po'i gnas mchog na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-25: rigs bdag phyag rgya lhun grub sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-26: gcig dang ma rnam spangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:219b-27: sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi gzugs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-2: sgrib pa mtha' spangs gdul bya la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-3: skad cig gcig gis spangs par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-4: chos rnams sna tshogs ji snyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-5: dngos po tha dad med phyir zlum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-6: khyad par spags dang tshad med dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-7: ye shes bzhi phyir 'khor lo bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-9: yu khyud zlum por kun nas bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-10: sku gsung thugs dang byin rlabs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-11: thugs rjes ma khyab med pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-12: yon tan rgyas pa'i dbyings su bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-13: rab byung ye shes mtha' bral bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-15: tshad dang bral ba'i sems kyi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-16: gzhi rtsa tshad med 'khor lor bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-17: gdod nas byin brlabs ngo bo'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-18: ma bsags lhun rdzogs mdzod nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-20: rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-21: sna tshogs dngos dang dngos med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-22: chos kun ngo bor rang gnas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-23: bdag gzhan gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-24: phyi dang nang bral sgrib pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-25: thun mong la brten thabs kyi 'bras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-26: ye shes thabs kyis 'phags pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220a-27: gdul bya'i blo la mngon snang bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-0: glo 'bur bzhi ni @220b lhag par mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-1: thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-2: gdul bya'i rim pa mtho dman kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-4: de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir shar; ;thabs mang bsam gyis mi khyab pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-5: lam brgyad rim par bgrod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-6: 'bras bu yon tan kun rdzogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-7: rta babs rgyu 'bras bcu drug bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-8: zhen dang spong ba'i lam bral bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-9: 'dod yon ye shes lnga rol te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-10: bdag mchod kun mnyes las byung bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-12: thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-13: ma chags thabs dang ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-14: che ba'i yon tan lhun rdzogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-15: nyi zla padma rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-16: las dang thugs rje smon lam gyis; ;byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-17: smon lam dbang gis de dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-18: thos pa rgya mtsho gsog phyir gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-19: de tshe dus kyi tha bral yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-20: ngo bo dus bzhi mnyam pa'i dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-21: dus kyi mtha' la mngon rtogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-22: thun mong min pa'i dus su bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-23: de tshe phyogs bcu rgyal ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-24: bskal pa bye bar lung bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-25: 'dul ba'i dus bab gsang ba'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-26: lag na rdo rjes bsdu ba mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-27: dus gsum rgyal bas byin brlabs phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:220b-28: 'khor gyi nang na skal mchog ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-3: 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-4: sku gsum sku gsum thugs nges pa'i; ;de bzhin nyid du thabs gang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-5: gshegs shing gshegs dang gshegs gyur pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-6: thar pa gsum dang ye shes dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-7: pha rol phyin pa drug ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-8: zhing khams yon tan bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-9: bye brag brgyad cu kun 'dus pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-10: rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun gyi mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-11: gang phyir rdo rje thugs chud pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-12: las dang spyod pa dka' thub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-13: srid pa'i ri bos mi bskyod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-14: de ni mi bskyod mchog tu gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-15: thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-16: ji snyed sku gsung thugs snang ba; ;mos dang thabs kyi khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-17: sna bar snang phyir snang mdzad mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-18: rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-19: tshogs rnams 'dus pa'i ngo bo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-20: yon tan rin chen ltar 'byung bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-21: rin chen 'byung bar gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-22: dpag tu med pa'i gsung gi sgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-23: dbang po thabs kyi bye brag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-24: don brtags gsung dang yi ge'i sgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-25: mtha' yas snang phyir mtha' yas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221a-26: dpag med thugs rjes mdzad pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-0: 'gro ba skyob @221b pa'i don mdzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-1: don grub ces ni rnam par bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-2: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-3: tha mal lnga nyid gnas dag cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-4: de las thabs des mngon byas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-5: der dbang bsgyur de nyid snang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-6: rgyal po nyid du brjod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-7: steng 'og gnyis las mngon gyur pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-9: gang de thabs las mngon gyur pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-10: bde ba'i gzugs dang tshor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-12: rnam shes zag med bde ba'i ros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-13: dbang sgyur ye shes rgyal por bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-14: gang phyir snang dang bsgoms dang bris //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-15: phyag rgya rtsa bcud thig le'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-16: dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-17: sngo dang ljang dang rim ldan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-18: rgyal ba kun gyi bde skyed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-19: spyod dang de las 'byung ba'i yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-20: thams cad de las skyed pa lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-21: tha mal zhen pa dag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-22: dbang sgyur rgyal mo lnga rang bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-23: sra dang gsher dang drod dang bskyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-24: nam mkha'i khams kyis gang phye ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-25: steng 'og thabs las mngon gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-26: yul dang shes rab dbyer med cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-27: thugs rjes shes rab 'brel pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-29: gnyis med gzigs pa spyan gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:221b-30: zag med stong pa'i klong chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-2: mtha' dbus bral ba'i de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-3: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes gang brjod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-4: thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-5: las dang lta ba nyon mongs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-6: shes bya'i dri ma mtha' yas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-7: rtogs pas sbyong zhing sreg pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-8: gos dkar ma ru brjod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-9: gang phyir las dang ting 'dzin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-10: ye shes thugs rje bar med chus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-11: gang dag 'khrud dang tshim byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-12: chu ni m'a ma k'i ru bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-13: gang phyir rtogs dang thabs dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-14: ting 'dzin thabs kyi rlung ngag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-15: bgrod pa med pa'i zhing khams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-16: sgrol bas sgrol ma nyid du bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-17: snying po rang byung ye shes nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-18: kun brten gnas dang khyab pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-19: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-20: sa yi snying por brjod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-21: rang byung snying po byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-22: nam mkha' lta bur bsam brjod med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-23: mtha' dbus sgro skur gang 'das pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-24: de ni nam mkha'i snying po nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-25: gang phyir thugs rje dpag med pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-26: 'gro ba chu bo rgal gyi bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-27: skyo ba med par gzigs pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-28: spyan ras gzigs dbang padma'i gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-29: rtogs dang dbyer med rdo rje yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-30: mtha' yi bdag rtogs mtshan ma dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-31: 'joms pas phyag na rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222a-32: thun mong nyid dang khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-0: @222b gsang ba'i rnam par shes par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-1: thun mong yul dang khyad par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-2: thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-3: mtshon dang rtogs dang bsgoms pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-4: lha yi bzhir ni mngon snang ba; ;byang chub sems dang bde ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-5: thabs kyi bde bas rab sgegs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-6: lha mo 'di ni sgeg mor bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-7: grol dang ma grol 'khor ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-8: phyi nang sgra yi bye brag kun; ;brag ca lta bur brjod mdzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-9: bar chad med pas phreng ba ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-10: tshim pa'i ngo bo gang bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-11: dri dang ldan pa'i khyad par nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-12: dbyangs nyid tshim zhing yid bde bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-13: de nyid rdo rje g'i rta ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-14: ro yis khyab cing gar sgyur ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-15: bde ba chen po bzhi yi gar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-16: khyab dang mdzes dang tshim pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-17: mi gnas bgrol bas gar mkhan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-18: rgyan dang chags pa'i sgra dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-19: yid kyi phreng ba bde ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-20: lha mo bzhi yi rang bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-21: ma rtogs 'gro ba mtha' yas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-22: rang bzhin thugs rje mdzad pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-23: yongs la phan 'dogs skyob pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-25: rtogs goms mthar phyin khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-26: las dang nyon mongs lta ba'i rim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-27: sel ba 'di ni sgrib sel lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-28: thabs dang shes rab gnas rtogs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-29: gang phyir spong len mi gnas bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-30: phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-31: dbye ba med pas kun tu bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:222b-32: bdag dang gzhan du 'dzin pa kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-0: @223a *// zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-1: lta ba'i dra ba gcod pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-2: zag med shes rab 'jam dpal sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-3: dbang po yi ge thig ler bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-4: gnas dang rtogs dang bsgoms pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-5: mngon du snang phyir brjod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-6: dus bzhi rim pa gnyis brgyad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-7: de nyid dgrol dang brod skyed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-8: spyod yul dag phyir brjod pa ni; ;dri dang bde bas ngam tshim zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-9: yid ldog med pas rdo rje dri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-10: phyi nang khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-11: me tog thig ler bder bkod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-12: rdo rje me tog bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-13: phyi nang sems la gnas bcas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-14: mun pa bsal phyir shes rab dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-15: ye shes snang ba bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-16: rdo rje gsal ba'i mar me ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-17: phyi nang dkyil 'khor ma lus la; ;rang byung ting 'dzin bde ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-18: thams cad khyab par gnas pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-19: khyab byed rdo rje dri chab ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-20: de bzhin nyid la dgongs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-21: 'khor ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa; ;byang chub snying po tshar bcad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-22: rnam par rgyal ba zhes su brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-24: gnyis 'dzin rtog pa'i gnyen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-25: rtogs goms de yis 'joms pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-26: ya m'anta krid gshin rje gshed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-27: gang phyir 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223a-28: thabs dang bcas pa'i rdzu 'phrul las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-0: 'joms @223b dang sgrol bar mdzad pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-1: rta mgrin rgyal po de bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-2: 'khor ba'i bdud rtsi dug lnga la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-3: ye shes lnga ru gsal goms pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-4: gnyis med rtsi ru gang 'khyil ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-5: sgrib zad bdud rtsi 'khyil bar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-6: gang du lus dang bcas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-7: dbang po yul dang rnam shes reg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-8: rang rgyud gcad pa'i ye shes nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-9: sgo ba rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-10: rang rgyud rtag chad zlog pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-11: gzungs dang lha dang bde ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-12: thig le rig par bcas pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-13: gang phyir gnas nas dgug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-14: gang du'ang 'gro bar mi nus pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-15: de las 'da' bar dka' ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-16: bstims nas bde bas dril bu ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-17: gzung dang 'khyud dang bsdams pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-18: gnyis su med pas bde chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-19: rang lus snang srid brtan g-yo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-20: rtogs dang goms pa'i tshul gyis sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-21: de dag ma lus dran byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-22: rig pa'i rgyal po kun dbyer med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-23: kun gzhi rdo rje mi phyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-24: kun tu bzang por de bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-25: ma lus 'dus byas ma byas chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-26: ma lus zad med khyab pa'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-27: rtogs dang shes dang gang gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-28: kun tu bzang mor de bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-29: mi shigs thig le bde chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-30: ye shes lnga ldan dvangs ma'i bcud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-31: rang byung lus can kun gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-32: ston pa po yi gsung can nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:223b-34: 'od bzhi ae tshogs tshul du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-2: lus can kun la khyab par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-3: rang byung thugs kyi bde ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-4: rgyu ba bral ba'i snying po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-5: bar ma aartha byang chub sems; ;nam mkha'i ye shes thugs kyi klong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-6: ma na ma ta dran rtog yid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-7: rnam shes rgyu ba'i dran rtog rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-8: ye shes nam mkhar gsal 'dod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-9: dran rtog rig pa 'khor du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-10: zag med rnam shes bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-11: ma lus nam mkha'i ye shes su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-12: bde chen rig pa'i mi rtog par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-13: bsdus te nyams la gnas par mdzad; ;bde ba chen po ma skyes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-14: nam mkha' lta bur mi phyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-15: nam mkha'i ye shes dbyer med sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-16: dus gsum kun gyi ngo bor gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-17: 'di zhes nye bar bstan pa ni; ;ae sogs bzhi yi tshul gnas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-18: phyi nang bar khyams gdong bar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-19: gsang ba'i 'og min rgyan rdzogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-20: thig le bam dbyibs spros pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-21: brjod med bstan pa gsung mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-22: byin brlabs bde chen mi rtog pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-24: ma ni ma nu ma ta ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-25: sdom byed dran rtog yid kyi dngos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-26: las can rnam shes de dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-27: gsal bar go bar 'khor du brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-28: chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224a-29: thig le bcu drug sems lnga'i dngos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-0: mi rtog lhan cig skyes pa'i @224b don; ;byin brlabs mngon sum tshul gyis gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-1: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-2: thig le zag med skyes pa'i dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-3: bsam med lhan cig skyes pa'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-4: bde ba chen po'i dus su 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-5: shes pa rten dang brten par bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-6: thabs kyi rim pa la brten nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-7: rlung gis bsdus pa'i don gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-8: rang rig thabs kyi rgyal por gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-9: gang dang gang la gang du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-10: gang gis gang tshe gang gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-11: brjod 'byung rtsa bar de gyur pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-12: gleng gzhi zhes ni bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-14: dbyer med ye shes gcig gi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-15: rdo rje 'chang chen kun bzang las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-16: sna tshogs sku ni rnam par 'phrul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-17: de tshe rgyal ba thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-18: lha la rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-19: lha min ston pa phrag dog rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-20: mi la thub pa'i dbang po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-21: byol song sgra yis 'dul mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-22: yi dvags drag pos gdung ba sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-23: dmyal ba sdug bsngal chos kyi rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-24: gdul ba'i sprul sku ngo bor shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-25: la la lha las 'pho ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-26: la lar lhums zhugs bltams pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-27: dka' thub bdud btul sangs rgyas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-29: gnas la nges pa yod min te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-30: dmyal ba yi dvags byol song dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-31: mi dang lha dang lha min te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:224b-32: so so'i gnas te gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-2: lha rnams dang ni mi rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-3: lha min yi dvags dud 'gro dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-4: dmyal ba so so'i 'gro ris dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-5: rang rang mos dang las dbang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-7: rang rang mos pas phrad pa'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-8: rang rang brda' skad tha dad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-9: rtogs dang grol bar gang gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-12: bstan pa'i theg pa sna tshogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-13: rang rang zhen pa mtha' yas phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-14: tshul dang mos pa'i dbang gis na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-15: theg pa sna tshogs tshul du snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-16: theg gcig mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-17: gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-18: dgu dang brgyad khri la sogs pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-22: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-23: de tshe 'gro ba so so yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-24: rang gi gzhi rtsa don rig nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-25: rim pa lnga 'am thabs gcig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-26: rig 'dzin sangs rgyas sa la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-27: rang rang cha 'dzin sprul pa'i lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-28: sar gnas 'khor gyi dang po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-29: de dag zhus pa'i rim gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-30: blo dang tshig dang yi ger bsdus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-31: rgyud ces bya ba rgyun du grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225a-32: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-0: lta spyod dkyil 'khor dbang dam @225b dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-1: sgrub pa 'phrin las lam rim ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-2: phyi dang nang dang sbas pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-3: rang bzhin gnas dang mngon byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-4: thabs kyi rgyud ni gsum du gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-5: phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-6: mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-7: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-8: bskyed rdzogs thabs rim gang bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-10: de ltar grags pa'i chos rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-11: rtog pa'i cho ga kun bshad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-12: rgyud chen rgyu 'phrul dra ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-13: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-14: thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-15: dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-18: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-19: gang zag thabs ni thun mong du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-20: blo yi yul du gang gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-21: de ni thun mong yul nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-22: gang zag thabs dang ston pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-23: de yi spyod yul ma gyur cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-24: thabs chen gsang ba dang ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-25: de ni thun mong ma yin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-26: de nyid skye bo 'khor gnyis don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-27: rnam gnyis tshul du snang bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-28: phung po khams dang skye mched nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-29: rgyal ba yab yum sems dpa' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:225b-30: sems ma nyid du lhun gyis grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-0: gsang yul dbang po rnam shes @226a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-2: ma lus 'joms phyir khro bo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-3: rtags sogs mtshan ma las skyes phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-4: yum ste las kyis mi gnas bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-5: yid chos bzang po bzang mo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-6: chags sogs nyon mongs drug po nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-7: thub pa sprul pa drug tu bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-8: de nyid phyogs bcu dus bzhi yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-9: phung po 'byung ba rnam shes yul; ;dbang po dus dang lus chos bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-10: mtshan ma nyon mongs yum nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-11: de nyid sems phyir ma skyes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-12: lhag pa'i bden gnyis 'brel pa las //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-14: dngos po snang grags chos thams cad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-15: skye ba med dang 'gag med dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-16: gnas pa med dang dmigs med dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-18: bdag phyir ye shes gsal snang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-19: gzhan phyir de dag ma rtogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-20: rang bzhin ngo bo ye nas gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-21: shin tu gab sbas gsang ba'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-22: de nyid legs par bshad pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-23: ye nas mnyam nyid gsang ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-24: ma rig log rtog rkyen dbang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-25: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ngo bor snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-26: de nyid bde gshegs snying po de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-27: dngos med dngos po'i snying po can //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226a-29: sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226b-3: ston pa 'khor gyis gcig la gcig /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226b-11: sa ya bcu gsum sku gsung thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226b-12: bde chen lha ru gsal byas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226b-13: nam mkha'i ye shes mngon phyung nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226b-14: bde ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226b-15: skye dang dga' dang gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226b-17: gang gis gang la gang bslangs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226b-18: gang rkyen dbang gis de dag las //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226b-26: sha da pa yi glu gar dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:226b-28: phyag rgya bzhi yis mngon sbyar bas //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:227a-11: shes rab gsang ba'i thig le dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:227a-18: sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lngas; ;thabs dang rang bzhin 'brel ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:227a-19: 'gro ba kun la rgyas btab pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:227a-20: snod bcud bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:227a-23: skye ba'i gzhi dang thabs dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:227a-24: skyes nas mthar phyin ye shes lnga //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:227a-26: ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:227a-27: 'gro ba mos pa'i khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:227a-28: gzugs dang kha dog sngags dang 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-003:227a-29: dkyil 'khor la sogs so sor gnas //
